Imran Khan's party urges IMF to consider Pakistan's instability in talks - sourcesThe party of Pakistan's jailed former prime minister, Imran Khan, has asked the International Monetary Fund to factor in the country's political stability in any further bailout talks, two people familiar with the matter said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 12:00:05 GMT LS7UHYKD6Z普纳克RCMYEPDPLAI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/imran-khans-party-urges-imf-consider-pakistans-instability-talks-sources-2024-02-28/Asif Shahzad世界亚太地区
Russia's parliament approves bill banning advertising on websites of 'foreign agents'Russia's lower house of parliament, the State Duma, unanimously approved a bill on Wednesday banning advertising on publications by "foreign agents", a designation authorities have given to anti-Kremlin politicians, activists and media. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:55:49 GMT LHW4UDRHLNPBHJT7I36Y3ZQXJE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russias-parliament-approves-bill-banning-advertising-websites-foreign-agents-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
'I hope Biden wins,' Brazil's Lula says ahead of US electionBrazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva hopes U.S. counterpart Joe Biden will win his bid for re-election in November, he said in an interview aired late on Tuesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:43:54 GMT 56MVHIO3KJOK5HVQPKPLWMSH4M https://www.reuters.com/world/i-hope-biden-wins-brazils-lula-says-ahead-us-election-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Italy suspends army general over book disparaging minorities, lawyer saysAn Italian army general reprimanded by the defence minister for publishing a book disparaging LGBT people, migrants, minorities and feminists has been suspended from duty for 11 months, his lawyer said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:16:09 GMT IFUUNNXOFVOMHNW34MAGIIAS7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italy-suspends-army-general-over-book-disparaging-minorities-lawyer-says-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
UK's Northern Ireland amnesty law in breach of human rights, court rulesBelfast's High Court ruled on Wednesday that a law introduced by Britain to offer conditional amnesties to ex-soldiers and militants involved in the region's decades of violence is in breach of the European Convention of Human Rights (ECHR). Wed, 28 Feb 2024 11:12:19 GMT 72IBNLSBVBMWJNOTW2KENYHQKE https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uks-northern-ireland-amnesty-law-breach- human-rights-court-rules-2024-02-28/Amanda Ferguson世界英国
Malaysia court reinstates abuse of power charges against ex-PM MuhyiddinA Malaysian appeal court on Wednesday reinstated charges of abuse of power against opposition leader and former Prime Minister Muhyiddin Yassin, state news agency Bernama reported. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:59:18 GMT KZFHGVQOQBPL5ERNMBEFIVRGG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/malaysia-court-reinstates-abuse-power-charges-against-ex-pm-muhyiddin-2024-02-28/Reuters世界亚太地区
Germany hosts peace talks between Armenia and AzerbaijanGermany is hosting two days of peace talks between Azerbaijan and Armenia five months after Azerbaijan recaptured its Karabakh region from its ethnic Armenian majority, prompting a mass exodus of ethnic Armenians. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:22:41 GMT RBCJGIQQBNIGRLIOARG4BRHXI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/germany-hosts-peace-talks- Between-armenia-azerbaijan-2024-02-28/Reuters世界
Israel presses on with settlement plans despite US criticismIsraeli Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich pledged to continue expanding settlements in the occupied West Bank, defying international pressure on Israel to stop building on land Palestinians see as the core of a future independent state. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:19:02 GMT KKGSNWKPPJKQRB5RLMUSQ5FB3Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-presses-with-settlement-plans-despite-us-criticism-2024-02-28/Reuters世界中东
Navalny to be buried on Friday, wife fears possible arrestsRussian opposition politician Alexei Navalny's funeral service and burial will take place in Moscow on Friday, his spokesperson said, but his allies accused the Kremlin of thwarting their attempts to organise a bigger event a day earlier. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 10:01:09 GMT BTJ4VSYYTFITXKVWPYDPTLRJYM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/alexei-navalnys-funeral-be-held-friday-moscow-spokesperson-2024-02-28/Andrew Osborn, Mark Trevelyan世界欧洲
South Korea to send military doctors to hospitals amid doctors' protestSouth Korea will send its military and community doctors to hospitals within the next few days as part of emergency measures to support the healthcare system after a mass walkout by trainee doctors, Prime Minister Han Duck-soo said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 09:24:59 GMT JOWSCEE5RFIVZDL4QME6TNO2DA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-send-military-doctors-hospitals-amid-doctors-protest-2024-02-28/Jack Kim世界亚太地区
EU's von der Leyen proposes using frozen Russian profits for Ukraine's militaryThe European Union should consider using profits from frozen Russian assets to buy military supplies for Ukraine, European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen said on Wednesday. Wed, 28 Feb 2024 08:52:19 GMT WQ7ZCMBW7NKSVCGJNVLLNPZMVA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eus-von-der-leyen-proposes-using-frozen- Russian-profits-ukraines-military-2024-02-28/Reuters世界欧洲
